data.meta_description:
181 likes, 47 comments - all_things_alpharetta on April 29, 2024: "10/10 at Foundation Social Eatery. (Every time) ‚úîÔ∏è

Once again,  had an unforgettable experience at @foundationsocialeatery in downtown Alpharetta! 

This place is truly a labor of love and like no other in town. ‚ô•Ô∏è From the seamless service to the impeccable attention to detail, every moment was perfection. ü´∂Shoutout to Andrew, our server, for his knowledge and friendliness‚Äîhis recommendations were spot-on! 

The meat and cheese board always hits.üî•. Next up‚Äîsucculent pull-apart pork ribs. Legit, melts in your mouth. ü§§ A light crisp and fresh Caesar salad topped with tasty anchovies.  Then on to the mains‚Ä¶ a perfectly cooked steak with a potato truffle combination of some sort that literally blew our minds. Plus mouthwatering chicken Bolognese with herb ricotta on top‚Äîabsolutely divine! 

Need a new favorite cocktail? ‚ÄúOff With Her Head‚Äù‚Äîa play on a lemon drop with pear brandy‚Äîtruly one of the best drinks I‚Äôve ever had! 

The ambience there is next-level, perfect for special occasions or just a nice meal at the bar. 

Don‚Äôt miss out on their caviar service or chicken liver pate, and save room for dessert‚Äîthe house-made sorbet, gelato, and gluten-free opera cake are to die for!

Go check them out, and let them know I sent you!

#FoundationSocialEatery #DowntownAlpharetta #Alpharetta #RealEstate #AllThingsAlpharetta".
